text:
e="preserve">Renate Krößner, also Renate Krössner (17 May 1945 – 25 May 2020) was a German actress. She was known for her main role in the 1980 movie "Solo Sunny". From 1985, she worked in West Berlin and was known for roles in TV series such as "Tatort" and "Einmal Bulle, immer Bulle". She was born in Osterode am Harz, Lower Saxony.
Krößner died on 25 May 2020 in Mahlow, Brandenburg at the age of 75.
